meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>brocade</kanji> <kanji>carp</kanji> is a fancy way of saying it's a carp that has a lot of pretty colors on it. It's a <vocabulary>colored carp</vocabulary> or a <vocabulary>colored koi</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: The readings for this word are both kun'yomi readings. You've learned both of these readings by now so you should be able to read this on your own.
